DOC.brief_summary: The impact of anti-platelet drugs on the concentrations of Brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) in human plasma and serum is unknown. It is the aim of this study to investigate the impact of a single dose of Aspirin (500 mg) or Clopdigrel (600 mg) on the concentrations of Brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) in plasma and serum of healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Anti-Platelet Drugs and Brain-derived Neurotrophic Factor (BDNF) in Human Serum and Plasma
DOC.criteria: Age 1850 years Gender: Male Any acute disease Any chronic disease Any medication Allergies / Intolerance in association with Aspirin or Clopidogrel
